website_summaries.verdict: Keeps all your watermelons, bottles, and cans in place from  the store to your door.
pros: Polyester net adjusts to fit most trunks, pickup truck beds or SUV rear cargo space
Can adjust from 44 to 56 inches wide, with height of 12 inches and depth of 12 inches
Three pockets help organize and store groceries, gear, tools, and other items
Keeps round items from rolling around
cons: Does not seem to fit some pickup trucks well

customer_reviews.title: Great fit - Honda Pilot 2011
customer_reviews.text: I can fit 3 grocery bags across perfectly without worrying about them falling over in the back of my Honda Pilot. There are already built in hooks that accommodate this net so nothing needs to be installed. I posted pictures so you can see. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mummus

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it for use in any pickup or SUV.
customer_reviews.text: I use this pocket storage net in my truck (Toyota Tundra) quit frequently. Using it at the tailgate saves having to climb into the bed of the truck to retrieve small items that may shift when the truck is in motion.
customer_reviews.author: John Davis

customer_reviews.title: Once installed it is great.  Mechanical ability and design needed.
customer_reviews.text: Had to engineer a way to hook up two of the connecting loops onto the bed of my pickup truck. Once that was accomplished things worked out well. It easily reaches across width of the truck bed and keep everything put into the three compartment areas from rolling around. I have used it to contain everything from potted plants to full 5-gallon water jugs.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl S. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Great cargo net pockets that keep things in their place.
customer_reviews.text: Although I just received my three pocket storage net, I haven't actually had a chance to use it. However I did check to be sure it would fit my pickup truck bed and it fits beautifully. The net looks to be very high quality and well-made. I have been needing something like this to keep things under control when riding around in my truck bed and that was the perfect product at the perfect time. The price is very reasonable compared to others on the web. My only negative is I wish it came with a small storage pocket. But other than that, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mantracker

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't be without one !
customer_reviews.text: I have used these Pocket Nets in each of my last three cars. One being and SUV. I wouldn't be without these. I just like not having to climb into the trunk or the back end of the SUV to retrieve items that rolled or slid forward. The reason I bought this one is the SUV I bought was larger than the last one and the one I had wouldn't fit so it went to the new owner of my Jeep Suv. My wife wouldn't let me take the larger one out of her car so another purchase was required, Wouldn't be without one !
customer_reviews.author: N. Beattie

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 2013 Honda accord
customer_reviews.text: Just as other reviewers said it doesn't come with any mounting hardware. My car's trunk has 1 hook on each side of the trunk and I ended up placing both "hooks" of the net on each side of the car's hooks. It worked, I can see that if my car had 2 separate hooks on each side the net would hang better because right now it sort of closes in on itself on top but it holds all my stuff and the compartments in it are definitely a plus!! Organization :-)
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: In my 2015 Toyota 4Runner..
customer_reviews.text: It fits well but, as another customer stated, it was a stretch in a 4Runner. Only reason it fit well in my vehicle is because I clipped two of the four sides to the seatbelt clips (see photo) which are only in models with 3rd row seating-- maybe others have additional hooks but those were the only two available to me. Also, mesh doesn't touch the floor unless items are in it (see photo). I may add straps to secure to the bottom. Will follow up in a few months with updated review.
customer_reviews.author: Ani Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I like thee pockets
customer_reviews.text: I did not notice, before I ordered, that attachment hooks were not included with this net. I have been advised that it is also available with "mounting brackets" but I don't believe these are what I needed anyway. I used bungee cords to attach the net in the cargo area of my car and the net worked fine to hold groceries upright. I think having three compartments is a great advantage, and each holds a bag of groceries comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Karyl Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Works but I’m ehhh about it
customer_reviews.text: The compartments are large and surprisingly fits 2-3 full bags of groceries. BUT, I hate how the back end of the mesh pocket leans forward bc the mesh is much higher on the back end so it kind of pushes everything towards you. I learned to fold the excess mesh over the groceries- kinda keeps things in place, but sometimes I come home and my canned goods have rolled out 😡 So, it works but comes with frustrations because it’s very very flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: It did not come with any hooks.
customer_reviews.text: The mesh was in great shape. The problem is that the corners of the mesh had no hooks to attach to the back of my truck. I had to temporarily use zip ties to hook the corners in place. Kind of a useless product if you don't the right equipment to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than You might think
customer_reviews.text: I thought I had finally found a net for my Ram 1500. The description says up to 56”. In the picture it looks like it goes side to side across the bed of the truck. If you connect it to the side of your bed it will be about a foot short of reaching the other side. So once again I will tie 12” of rope to the ends so the net can be attached to other side. Why can’t someone make a cargo net that truly fits a full size truck? Other than it not really fitting my truck, the net seems to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: A real mom

customer_reviews.title: It broke and won’t fit trucks at all. Maybe a sedan at best.
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t fit a truck bed at all and one of the hookups broke trying to see if it could stretch to fit. Product pictures are false advertisement. Standard F150 truck bed and the product failed. Only good for small sedans at best. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Broke first time I tried to use it. There are no permanent bindings on the ends to prevent the beads from pulling/slipping right out. I tried the "online returns center" asked for a refund and it says I have to return the broken net. I should NOT have to PAY to return junk.
customer_reviews.author: C L

customer_reviews.title: How did I live without this?
customer_reviews.text: I am the proud new owner of a 2019 Stingray Corvette which is my daily driver. Grocery shopping was always an issue until I purchased this baby and it has been a game changer. Sometimes it really are the little things that make all the difference. I'm still searching for the perfect phone holder but that seems to a lot more difficult than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Simms

customer_reviews.title: No more rolling melons...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Fits perfectly across the back of my Jeep Cherokee. Only problem was the Jeep--which had only three tie-off points. Rigged a fourth with an elastic tie-down. I bought it to keep round melons and milk jugs from dancing around the back of car. Works like a charm. Well made elastics and netting. Looks like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Barry J.

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: I had this for less than 10 days in the back of my Pathfinder and one of the loops that holds the net to the side wall has broken. It broke in a seam too so I’m guessing the construction was just lacking. I only used it twice! It also was a tangled mess to get items in and out. I wasn’t expecting the best thing in the world at this price point but with the reviews I thought it would last longer than 10 days with light use. I’ll look for one with thicker netting and better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Better than envelope style organizers...
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my Toyota Tacoma's bed. Though it did not come with any tethering hardware (which is the only reason I gave it 4 stars rather than 5 stars), I was able to use 4 heavy duty zip ties to attach it to my truck's rail system. It fits great! The only issue is that I will have to cut the zip ties whenever I need to remove it (not that I have a situation in mind where I might have to).
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Stays put!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pick-up truck and knew that I needed something for the back to keep things from flying all over the bed. I have tried the envelope nets before and they are great for a car or SUV. TheZone Tech Three Pocket Mesh Storage Net has worked out perfectly! I may buy another one for the front of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: SassyChick72

customer_reviews.title: I like it and it appears strong enough for what we ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well so far. Just received it a few days ago. I haven't tested it on a trip yet. It needs some kind of additional clips to hook it to current hooks in the SUV, OR after market hooks need to be added to the SUV. My SUV has only one hook on each side at the correct level but the Standard hooks are too robust for the Mesh loop to fit over. I did order some extra hook and will install them later. As to the mesh net, I like it and it appears strong enough for what we need.
customer_reviews.author: hleejpn

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't have a way to actually hook the net where I initially wanted it my car, but my car does have a place for a net more towards the entrance of the trunk. So, I DID rig it up somehow in the back of the trunk, lol! It stays in place and I'm satisfied since none of my belongings move around anymore and it DOES have great stretch to it.
customer_reviews.author: Techiyah.Baht.Israel

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this for my 2012 4Runner easy to put in and out holds a lot of groceries and prevents them from rolling around
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Tansel

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 2018 Sequoia
customer_reviews.text: Now that we have so much rear cargo space, we needed something to hold the smaller items inplace. This 3-pocket design allows for three backpacks to store easily. It works well with grocery bags and food items like a boxed pie. My wife is extremely happy with the product, especially when the Toyota official version is 3x the cost.
customer_reviews.author: USCarlos

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy
customer_reviews.text: I have this stretched across the bed/tailgate of a 2015 GMC Sierra. A little short for that application, but we connected it to the sides with those plastic coated 8" long heavy duty "twist ties". Now we're not chasing groceries and other smaller purchases to the front of the bed when we get home. The net has been exposed to the elements for a few months now and is holding up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisB

customer_reviews.title: Good but doesn't hold up long term
customer_reviews.text: I bought this almost a year ago now. It has been used weekly since then and has done it's job well. The only complaint I have is that yesterday one of the loops broke. It doesn't hinder its ability to hold my groceries in place, but if another loop breaks I'll have to look for another product to do the job- hopefully one that doesn't break in less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: AJ's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Simple product. Needs carabiners
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install but I do recommend some small carabiners to clip to your truck's cargo hooks. It doesn't hold a lot but does work great for what I need it for - goreceris and smaller stuff I don't want rolling around the truck bed.
customer_reviews.author: R. White

customer_reviews.title: The description is misleading
customer_reviews.text: It's really not ideal for pickup trucks. And it doesn't come with any kind of hooks to help you install it. I ended up giving it to my wife to put in the trunk of her car because it's not a good fit on my f150
customer_reviews.author: tonytanksr

customer_reviews.title: Zone Tech Car Trunk Mesh Cargo Net Three Pocket Net
customer_reviews.text: I was able to install this using my pickup's bed factory attachments...so far I believe it will serve the purpose. A little pricey for what you get...but hopefully over the long run it will justify it's price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Good product, just not compatible with my car
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this isn't compatible with the Rav 4. The hooks in the car can't support this product well. Besides it not being compatible with my car, this product is made of durbale material. Overall, the product is nice, but it just didn't work with my car.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie W.

customer_reviews.title: A quality product for a truck bed
customer_reviews.text: This net is exactly what I was looking for to use in the bed of my truck. The elastic is nice and stretch, the sticking and netting both seem to be of good quality and quite durable. I wish it had come with some mounting hooks, but in the end that isn't the biggest problem, especially for the price. I was able to use bungie cords to attach it to the adjustable mounts in the bed of the truck.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to use
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work at all. I opened the package and the net was so tangled up that it took me forever to figure out where the ends were and the top and bottom were. I never could get it hooked up in the back of my truck. Utterly useless.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Reader

customer_reviews.title: doesn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: it doesn’t fit in the truck bed. , but in the picture it shows it fit perfectly. it’s way too small.
customer_reviews.author: Zahidur R.

customer_reviews.title: Will not work in a truck
customer_reviews.text: This will not work in a truck bed unless you have a very specific mounting rail. It comes with zero clips. And most trucks to not have upper mounts that are only 12 inches apart.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product. It came with no parts to install ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product . It came with no parts to install it. So I had to make my own ideas to install it . The worst item that I have purchased from Amazon so far .I do not recommend this net .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK, not great...
customer_reviews.text: ok for a few items, just not much capacity, items still fall over, blocks all but a foot of bed, only good for a small trip, easier to place in back seat area on floor
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: Measure your truck
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the back of a Ford F-150, and it was almost impossible for me to stretch it across to use. I'm not sure what size truck these are for, but they were very difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Not that sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my Silverado and it was not that long, couldn't really hook the bottom just the top and you need to put items inside for it to stay, not enough space for big loads
customer_reviews.author: LaSu'e

customer_reviews.title: We are very happy that we did
customer_reviews.text: We bought a new car that didn't already have a cargo carrier in it. We investigated all that was out there and decided on this one. We are very happy that we did. It works great for holding my bags, water bottles and anything that could easily roll around in the trunk. I use it every time I go shopping. It is well built.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: A good storage net
customer_reviews.text: I like the item just fine and will be able to make it work, but not with the way my wife's vehicle is configured (Buick Enclave). There are only 2 places the loops can fit over, so I'll have to get some clips to secure the front side to the D-hooks that are closer to the lift gate. I'm guessing carabiners will work ok, but, we'll have to see...
customer_reviews.author: Tommy H

customer_reviews.title: Not for 2013 Ford Escapes
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2013 Ford Escape. The product requires a total of four hooks to work properly; (2) on the left side and (2) on the right side. Unfortunately, I didn't know this when I bought the mesh and now it is precariously hanging on to the only (2) hooks I have in my cargo space. When filled it stays in place, but once emptied it falls off the hooks. I am making it work, but I would not have purchased it had I known how many hooks it required.
customer_reviews.author: RR1361

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2017 Corvette and it fits perfectly, almost like it was made for the car. The cargo net that came with the car is really small, and I go to costco a lot, so this product is really handy, and the quality is pretty good too.
customer_reviews.author: Bill98579

customer_reviews.title: All net.
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy product. But no how to install at all needs instructions for the things it does not include and are accessible at a hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: The Mouse

customer_reviews.title: No hooks
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t say anywhere on the page that you need your own hooks of some sort. I can’t use this in my truck until I get them separately. I wish I had known this when it arrived because I needed it as soon as it had arrived. The pictures doesn’t even show the loops at all either.
customer_reviews.author: Phil L.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality - fits Honda CR-V
customer_reviews.text: This cargo net seems to be high quality and is a nice size. No additional hardware was required for my 2016 CR-V. Fits brown grocery bags perfectly. Since I do a lot of shopping at Trader Joe's this has worked out really well for my use. Without it, everything tended to get jostled around in the back. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT fit a full size pick up!
customer_reviews.text: Don't get this if you have a pull size pick up. I had to put 4 carabiners on each side to make it fit, and it still doesn't work right. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie R. Becker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and versatility for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I had two reasons for purchasing this pocket mesh storage net. I wanted something to keep my golf clubs from sliding from the back to front of my truck bed and the 3 pocket storage compartments allow me to separate my golf gear as I choose. It meets all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Jack 1025

customer_reviews.title: Not for a truck bed.
customer_reviews.text: 1. It should come with clips 2. Cannot clip it into bed of truck even if there were clips. But would like it if it did. seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Leigha McDonald

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: My family makes fun of me because I bought this, but I absolutely LOVE it! It keeps grocery bags from flying all over my trunk, and it also keeps me from having to search my trunk for things when I put them within the net.
customer_reviews.author: The Calcul8or's Son

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t even come close to fitting in a small truck bed. In no way shape or form was I able to make it stretch across and work.
customer_reviews.author: jmanrb2010

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Inexpensive Addition to Any Pickup Truck
customer_reviews.text: For a few dollars, this net provides easy useful storage in a pickup bed for groceries and other items, without taking up the whole bed. Yee ha.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Zappia

customer_reviews.title: Week one - good so far!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and would give it 5 stars if you received hooks to lock it in. As it stand you need to create your own harness to tie it down. Product material seems to be good and stretches nicely. I have 2017 Tundra short bed and it works well, will update later if there are any issues. I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Martin L. Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Useless without extra's/bungees or something
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stretch across bed width, so I just threw it out. Useless without extra's/bungees or something.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Block

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but not wide enough for full sized pick up
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to be well made, and I have used it once for corralling loose items. However, it does not reach across the span of my f-150 pick up bed. I attached zip tie loops to my rails, then used s-clip caribiners to attach the corners of the net to the loops. With the bed cover on it isn't easy to place items in the net,as it is stretched taught across the bed. I'll likely have to use a different product to get my desired ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M.

customer_reviews.title: it works great.
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a new to me vehicle, and immediately realized I needed some kind of net or organizer in the back, to keep my grocery bags from tipping over. This net has 3 compartments so it holds 3 paper grocery bags, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: P. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A little more length would have been perfect. I put my 3 light blankets in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I was able to make it work in the back part of my Silverado truck using tie down cords. A little more length would have been perfect. I put my 3 light blankets in the bottom of the three compartments to prevent bumps noise/breakage when contents of future grocery bags etc will go on top of them. It will be especially handy when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Carol G.

customer_reviews.title: A little small, but it does what's supposed to...
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly what I had in mind, and the image was a little deceiving... anyway, it was cheap enough and it does what's supposed to do, however, I had to get my own hooks to install it, plus, you will need to make sure your truck can have it installed.
customer_reviews.author: Thiago Del Rios

customer_reviews.title: Good net for good deal
customer_reviews.text: Perfect net for the price, just wanted something to rig up in the bed of my tacoma to prevent crap from sliding towards the front under the tonneau. Stretches tight enough with some paracord to keep it low enough, and the pockets hold plenty. Haven't used it long enough for longevity review, but at the price it's constructed fair, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Trencher

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Try it you'll like it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I bought the one without the mounting screws ( didn't want to screw into my suv) instead I used bungee cord with rubber hooks and it worked perfectly. Used it for the first time yesterday for groceries and it kept everything in place! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: riverhouse

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I ordered the Zone Tech Three Pocket Mesh Storage Net. It keeps my groceries neatly seated in the trunk of my car. Before, after arriving home, I'd have to reach into the far recesses of my trunk to retrieve items that have been relocated there. I did use a cardboard box, but when I didn't need it for groceries, it was just in the way. The Mesh Storage Net can be easily removed and placed out of the way when not in use. I am very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: JudyB

customer_reviews.title: No clips to secure net
customer_reviews.text: I give it 3 stars. This item doesnt fit fully for my pickup truck and it does not come with clips to secure the net.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great storage space!
customer_reviews.text: This net holds so much "stuff"! We use it to hold everything from groceries to jumper cables. It's easy to install - we love ours!
customer_reviews.author: Cgirl

customer_reviews.title: Needs to come with hooks
customer_reviews.text: This would be perfect if it came with any way to attach to my truck other than the zip ties I came up with. Holds a lot though
customer_reviews.author: Happy Reader

customer_reviews.title: this net is useless. I opted for the Highland trunk net and ...
customer_reviews.text: The net itself is well made and seems durable, but it came with no hardware. Both my BMW X5 and Audi A4 have no built in hooks, so without included hardware, this net is useless. I opted for the Highland trunk net and rated that 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: KevKas

customer_reviews.title: The product it’s self is quality but it doesn’t really ...
customer_reviews.text: The product it’s self is quality but it doesn’t really work for my 15 pilot. We bought it be everything said it would work but you have to right it up and it still doesn’t work well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the quality is great, not cheap at all
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today! Fits perfectly in the back of my SUV... the quality is great, not cheap at all. I’m excited to not have items moving about in the back. Will be back with an update after using a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Bacon06519

customer_reviews.title: Anchor loops, break easily
customer_reviews.text: Went to town and put groceries in it. Came back home and one of the loops already broke.
customer_reviews.author: V. A. Vinson

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit my truck
customer_reviews.text: Will not fit on a full size truck. Tried in a F-250 and F-150. Not as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Why Didn't I Buy This Sooner?
customer_reviews.text: Got the one for a Honda Pilot. Excellent fit. The pockets are a good size and large enough to hold a very large reusable grocery bag. Items remain in place. No longer have to worry about groceries or hardware tipping over and rolling around the back of the vehicle. Works great with watermelons. And, if you need to remove it, it comes off very simply.
customer_reviews.author: thegaryw

customer_reviews.title: The net itself is great! However
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this net for my 2014 Jeep Grand Cherokee. The net itself is great! However, it does not fit well within my jeep. The hooks in the back of my jeep just are not wide enough, making the net not stretch open very tight. I still have it up, but would not suggest it for my type of vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Ayli

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit awesome price
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2014 Honda CRV well but haven’t stored anything in it to date. It does hold the other items behind from sliding around though. All in all very happy
customer_reviews.author: M. Hekker

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality product although it didn't fit well in my car... My cars fault, not this... Over all I made it work. Holds up well and it's strong.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Dez

customer_reviews.title: horrible
customer_reviews.text: horrible. Missing something to connect it too. Slid around, socks. Thanks for nothing
customer_reviews.author: Shawn fehlner

customer_reviews.title: Little challenging for a pickup truck, but it’ll work
customer_reviews.text: For a pickup truck, as long as you have 2 bungee cords to string through it to attach on both sides..... you’re good to go
customer_reviews.author: jimmy311

customer_reviews.title: This unit is a PERFECT fit in the hatch of the Corvette
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for to hold packages, etc in my C7 Corvette. This unit is a PERFECT fit in the hatch of the Corvette. It attaches to the existing hardware. One of my friends saw this and had to have it...so I ordered it for him too
customer_reviews.author: RbtMartin

customer_reviews.title: Great for groceries
customer_reviews.text: This just works great at keeping groceries and small packages from sliding around.
customer_reviews.author: MNMark

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough. I just wish there were hooks to attach it to my truck and some sort of spreader bar at the ends.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is advertised as
customer_reviews.text: the straps and mesh are all quality material. A little smaller than I would've liked but there are only so many trunk organizers to chose from and I didn't bother measuring so entirely my fault. Not a warning: but I did have to buy carabiners to attach but they are only $1 at the 99 cent stores so who cares. Also seller arrived of arrival and arrived on time. so thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A.

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Love it...the second gen cargo nets are much better, allowing for compartmentalization and easy of use
customer_reviews.author: qeep kuestioning

customer_reviews.title: Check the "attachment loops" before installing.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to put my wifes paperwork in because she travels for work. It worked great until she put a little too much weight in one side. But its meant to stretch, one of the loops that connects to the ring on the bed of her pickup pulled through the ball and now cant connect it back. Great product but fix the ends where the loops are tied together.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Moreno

customer_reviews.title: 2018 ram 1500
customer_reviews.text: hard to make/find hook points for the 2018 ram. Other than that its great
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: No hardware included
customer_reviews.text: I wish this came with hardware. I could not figure out how to attach it in my son's 2006 Santa Fe. I have bought some mounting clips from another vendor and I hope those will work when they arrive. Bummer of a gift because we couldn't install it right away. Probably my own fault for not understanding how these things work.
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2017 Corvette Grand Sport Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I installed this cargo net on my 2017 Corvette Grand Sport and it fits perfect. So far it is holding up well. I would highly recommend if you have a C7 Corvette.
customer_reviews.author: William Van Epps

customer_reviews.title: Stretches easily
customer_reviews.text: At first use I thought this was amazing. After only a few used of light items this net has stretched from 1 end to the other! It is pointless to even jeep in my car. Although grocery bags don't topple over too much if you put anything else in it you can hear it move since it stretched so much! Keep in mind I purchased less than 3 weeks ago.
customer_reviews.author: Golden

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size for trucks
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit our truck does not stretch to 56 inches. Going to use in our chevy sonic, it fits there.
customer_reviews.author: Annie T

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed with flexible and easy installation, all at a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed with flexible and easy installation, all at a very reasonable price. --- This item fit perfectly in the rear hatch area of my 2015 Corvette Stingray, looking almost as if it was a "factory option".
customer_reviews.author: NostraD

customer_reviews.title: Mesh is of good quality, I attached it to the bacl of ...
customer_reviews.text: Mesh is of good quality, I attached it to the bacl of my seats with a clip. The only thing I feel needs improving is that it sits tilted but since it's not attached at the bottom and I don't have anywhere to attach it to it is something I can't change
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: No hardware included.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered TWO of these and NEITHER one arrived with any form of hardware to hold the net in place. Simply a divided net in a bag.
customer_reviews.author: Triple Trouble

customer_reviews.title: Works well last a long time except
customer_reviews.text: the straps that connect out to the hooks stretched over time. Maybe reinforce those in future versions.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought to just out groceries in. It is oknot the best but it will do. Things dont fly all over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: C7 Cargo Net
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a cargo net for my 2014 Corvette and found this on the Corvette Forum from another owner. It fits great and works great would recommend this to any C7 owner to keep things from sliding or rolling around your cargo compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Marsik

customer_reviews.title: Check for hooks in car first.
customer_reviews.text: Fits across trunk of car, but had difficulty finding hooks to attach to. Check for 2 hooks approx. 1ft apart on each side before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Milton or Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Nothing as described. I received the product and threads were everywhere and this is not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: K. Holden

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend the product which is made for vehicles
customer_reviews.text: Very fast delivery time. Product was well made and fit my needs perfectly. Would highly recommend the product which is made for vehicles, but I used it for storage of puppets in a children's puppet theater that I built for a non profit organization.
customer_reviews.author: Macman955

customer_reviews.title: The info on Amazon said this would fit my car ...
customer_reviews.text: The info on Amazon said this would fit my car. It hangs loosely on the floor ): 2013 Ford Escape In the process of returning.
customer_reviews.author: Twin Momaha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Just what I was looking for at a ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Just what I was looking for at a great price. The dealership where I got my car wanted over $50. for the same thing. Shame on them. I'm completely satisfied and would recommend buying from this dealer. Fast curtious service.
customer_reviews.author: Groomer

customer_reviews.title: Having said that the netting was very sturdy and I liked the design
customer_reviews.text: Had to return did not fit my Dodge Caliber SXT 2012 . One of the loops broke when I stretched it to try and measure length. Having said that the netting was very sturdy and I liked the design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy suggested clamps to hook in!
customer_reviews.text: Is great product. I bought because I was tired of groceries rolling around the back of Chevy equinox. Fits and works great! Only wish it came with hooks or clips to install it with
customer_reviews.author: cynthia h

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This works absolutely perfectly in my 2017 Nissan Pathfinder. Just the right width to stretch from side to side, and no hardware needed, it hooks on the built in clips in my car. Easily holds all of my grocery bags securely. Best accessory by far I have bought for my new car!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer
customer_reviews.text: Add small carabiners to each side and your good to go
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Truck bed storage
customer_reviews.text: Great for keeping things from rolling around in the bed of my truck!
customer_reviews.author: Cbakeman

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Nice but needs hooks to install I had to get hooks from home depot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Zone Tech Three Pocket Mesh Storage Net - Black Mesh Three Pocket Trunk Cargo Organizer
feature_bullets: ► ADJUSTABLE - The Zone Tech storage net can adjust to fit most trunks, pickup truck beds or SUV rear cargo space. This Zone Tech storage net can be adjusted from 44 inch to 56 inch in width, with a 12 inch depth and 12 inch height.

► STRETCHABLE - The Zone Tech storage net is stretchable to fit the span the width of the pickup bed or wherever it is needed. The storage net stretches around your stuff and you can cram even more things in it than ever before.

► CLUTTER FREE - The Zone Tech organizer keeps your trunk and storage area organized and clutter free. The storage net holds everything in place where you put it. The Zone tech storage net features three pockets which help to organize or store groceries, gear, tools and other items.

► HIGH QUALITY - The Zone Tech storage net is made from high quality polyester material to ensure durability and longevity. The Zone Tech storage net is designed to safely secure cargo in car, van or SUV's.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars947 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
